TimelineContent.heroTitle: I'm a Builder from England üá¨üáß interested in Crypto, Startups and Software Development with a background in Venture Capital & Acting.

AngelPage.title: Angel Investing
AngelPage.intro1: I love meeting founders who are building something they genuinely care about. When I see potential and ways I can help beyond just capital, I'm eager to get involved early.
AngelPage.intro2Part2: in pre-seed and seed rounds. Although I don't write the biggest checks, I try to be useful. Whether that's introductions, product feedback, technical advice, or just being someone to talk through problems with, I want to be the kind of investor I'd want on my cap table.
AngelPage.intro3: Building something interesting? I'd love to hear about it.

ProjectsPage.title: Projects
ProjectsPage.walletyDescription: A Polkadot & Kusama ecosystem analytics website, aimed at improving the UX of crypto wallets in the ecosystem.
ProjectsPage.othentDescription: Merging Web2 to Web3 user logins with a familiar and simple interface, enabling SSO Oauth accounts a Arweave ecosystem wallet.
ProjectsPage.liquidOpsDescription: A lending and borrowing protocol on Arweave and AO. I Co-Founded the project with Marton Lederer.

WritingPage.title: Writing
WritingPage.substackSignup: Sign up to receive new blog posts by email.
